hawarden-contest

Recollections of Verdi [arr. Rimmer]
Hawarden Park, Hawarden, Flintshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £10, 3rd £7, 4th £5, 5th £3. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£2) Biddulph, 2nd(£1) Penketh Tannery, 3rd(10s.) Ellesmere Port. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2013, 7:33 a.m. Oct. 5, 2013, 7:41 a.m.

2 Edge Hill J. A. Greenwood
3 Ellesmere Port Public T. Brown
4 Connah's Quay Silver J. A. Greenwood
5 Biddulph W. Nixon
5 Kidsgrove Excelsior James Thorpe
